column1: #Text=George Bush and Irish Prime Minister attend reception at White House to commemorate St. Patrick 's day
#Text=, the Prime Minister of Ireland visited the White House Monday to commemorate St. Patrick 's Day .
#Text=Mr. Ahern makes this visit annually , for what he calls a " very substantial and useful meeting .

#Text= Mr. Ahern started his speech by saying " Mr. President and Mrs. Bush , thank you for the welcome and honor which you 've extended to our delegation , and to all the Irish guests , from North and from South , who are here at the White House this morning to mark St. Patrick 's Day , Ireland 's National Day .

column1: #Text=I 'm very grateful , Mr. President , for the opportunity which we have just had to hold a very substantial and useful meeting with you in the Oval Office .
#Text=We appreciate it , and we appreciate the amount of time that you 've given to us .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Mr. Bush commented on the relationship between the US and Ireland , saying that  we 've [ the US and Ireland have ] had a long relationship , Taoiseach .

_	_	_	_

#Text=He said that  we [ the people of Ireland ] are all glad to say , and enormously pleased and proud to stand here and say that we 've achieved peace in Ireland .
